html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13362024-12-16ISC
ActIndian Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Indian Estates Regulations and the Indian Referendum Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations amending the INDIAN ESTATES REGULATIONS AND THE INDIAN REFERENDUM REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) remove the definition of "Minister" as the term is defined in the Indian Act; (2) update "the Indian and Eskimo Affairs Branch" to "the Department" (of Indigenous Services); (3) update the definition of "Assistant Deputy Minister" from "Assistant Deputy Minister, Lands and Trusts Services Department of Indian Affaris and Northern Development" to "Assistant Deputy Minister, Lands and Economic Development"; (4) update the references to the Department (of Indigenous Services) in the definition of "electoral officer"; (5) replace "marking the ballot by placing a cross, check mark or other mark" with "marking the ballot by placing a check mark or other mark"; and (6) update the references from the Department of Indian Affairs and Northern Development to "the Department" (of Indigenous Services).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0280 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending the INDIAN ESTATES REGULATIONS AND THE INDIAN REFERENDUM REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) remove the definition of "Minister" as the term is defined in the Indian Act; (2) update "the Indian and Eskimo Affairs Branch" to "the Department" (of Indigenous Services); (3) update the definition of "Assistant Deputy Minister" from "Assistant Deputy Minister, Lands and Trusts Services Department of Indian Affaris and Northern Development" to "Assistant Deputy Minister, Lands and Economic Development"; (4) update the references to the Department (of Indigenous Services) in the definition of "electoral officer"; (5) replace "marking the ballot by placing a cross, check mark or other mark" with "marking the ballot by placing a check mark or other mark"; and (6) update the references from the Department of Indian Affairs and Northern Development to "the Department" (of Indigenous Services).
